vision_description: PKH aims to become the leading technology solution provider in Vietnam and Southeast Asia, helping to connect medical services to a wide range of people, bringing breakthrough efficiency to medical units, as well as convenient and satisfying experiences for patients in medical examination, treatment, and personal health care.
mission_description: PKH provides the Medpro platform - an intelligent healthcare access solution that offers users new healthcare methods, anytime and anywhere, through a highly interactive online platform, connecting with leading medical facilities and a large, dedicated, and experienced team of medical experts.
about_description: This application helps patients and their relatives to register for medical appointments online at hospitals anytime and anywhere without needing to visit the hospital.
product_service_description: With a user-centric philosophy, the Medpro solution is designed to provide the best experience for users through the use of numerous digital technology resources and features.
